item.description:
Hi friends-
We have 11 people who have contacted me to say they are interested in the JAZZ and the AMERICAN SONGBOOK performance at the Red Pepper Chinese Restaurant in Framingham.

I would like to call and make a reservation for us for Sunday evening April 27 (after Pesach).
The Alanna Manning Trio will be playing. It is from 5:00-8:00 p.m. $3.00 per person cover charge

Anyone else interested??? Let me know soon!
It should be a fun evening!!
Your contact and organizer for this event is Jane (singlesmingle18@aol.com)
Elie
item.name: Red Pepper Chinese Rest. + Jazz
